After I made my first appearance on the Johnny Carson show in, like, 1974, Larry and I went shopping in Macy's. He kept following me about five steps behind, humming the Tonight Show theme really loud and pointing at me. Naturally, we got thrown out of Macy's for him doing that. It was nice of him. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
